Comment.Text: NextDialogFlog: mark to go to next dialog or not bullyStart: user finishs filling the basic information at beginning stickmanName: indicate which character the user want to talk with Dialog1ReadFlag, Dialog2ReadFlag, Dialog3ReadFlag: check the dialog is readed or not by the user SayNothingFlag: indicate User wants to say anything or not GamePauseFlag: indicate the game is paused or not

CallingExpression.name: readFile
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: 1.m4a

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog or click Say Nothing button: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Hey, guys!

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: click the character to talk with Paula, Marie or Chris. or click Say Nothing button to go to school directly

CallingExpression.name: setStickmanName
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: unknown

CallingExpression.name: setStickmanName

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Hey Chris. You made that picture?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Every child with a tablet could do that.
 
Dialog 2: 
Yeah, it is pretty awesome. You are very talented.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
About that guy on the picture.
 
Dialog 2: 
What are you doing after school today?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Maybe you should not have posted it on the internet. 
 
Dialog 2: 
Good work man! Those new kids need a propoer initiation!
 
Dialog 3: 
He is the new kid at school, right?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
About that guy on the picture.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
It is not nice doing such things to people!
 
Dialog 2: 
Do not you think he will feel sad when everybody loughs at him?

CallingExpression.name: setStickmanName
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: unknown

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Hey Paula. How are you doing!

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
I do not know, I have a bad feeling about this.
 
Dialog 2: 
That picture is really funny.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
But, do not you think we will get in trouble?
 
Dialog 2: 
Yeah, you are right. You are lookining very nice today.

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
You are right, I guess he will not have the balls.
 
Dialog 2: 
Yeah, I bet he is.
 
Dialog 3: 
I do not really know him.

CallingExpression.name: setStickmanName
CallingExpression.StringLiteral: unknown

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
Hi Marie. Is everything alright?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
I do not like it either. 
 
Dialog 2: 
Okay... we can talk about that later if you want.
 
Dialog 3: 
Come on give a little smile. Just look at the picture, it is very funny, is not it?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
You do not look happy today.
 
Dialog 2: 
Nevermind, what are you doing after school?

CallingExpression.name: SendTextContent
CallingExpression.StringLiteral:
Please read the dialog: 
 
Dialog 1: 
You are talking about that picture?
 
Dialog 2: 
What do you mean?
